name: 10 Seconds Arcanoid
description:
You can play game at ludum dare jam site. I have lost project, so i cant rebuild it(

Controls: ‘A’,’<-‘(left Arrow) to move pan left; ‘D’ or ‘->’(right Arrow) to move pan right; ‘Escape’ to go to “Pause menu”

Aim is to make as much score as u can, but be careful, if you loose ball, or any object you will loose some points.

Vote for it on LD jam 51
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/10-seconds-arcanoid
